    • Method Detail

      • createPackageableElementFile

        protected void createPackageableElementFile(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.PackageableElement element,
                                            org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
        Creates the files corresponding to the class. For a "simple" class generates 2 headers (one for the privates concrete operations and one for the attributes, public operations and virtual / abstract operations and one body file.
        Specified by:
        createPackageableElementFile in class ModelElementsCreator
        Parameters:

        classifier -
        Throws:
        org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
